section.p: Once you have your own ship you can go anywhere on the high seas, exploring or trading. The shipbuilders of Hagashin are renowned throughout the Orient and you can get a good vessel at a fair price.
If you already own a ship docked at Hagashin you can sell it for 20% less than these prices. If you do buy a ship, record its details on the Ship’s Manifest. The crew quality is average.
